answers.answer: At this time, nothing really can.  The point of drug therapy is to  bring the active carrier to an state of less viral activity which is often mislabeled as "inactive".I don't have any answer to your diabetes related question.

question: An inactive carer is still a carer. Which from my limited knowledge means that the patient's immune system has contain the virus, but failed to clear it, Can't any thing be done to help the immune system? If my pancrea is not working to it's full potential (diabetis), it will get help by administering Iodine. Is there nothing at all that can be done to help inactive carers?
title: hepb boosters
